sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>0</base_damage> <critical_rating/> <defense/> <description>Balance is key in a well-constructed melee weapon. Professional weaponsmiths can use modern ultra-light materials to create a sword or axe that is not only lighter, but also more accurate in the hands of a skilled warrior. This attachment can be used with any melee weapon. Base Modifiers: Grants the weapon the Accurate (+1) Quality. Modification Options: 1 Weapon Quality (Accurate + 1) Mod, 1 Decrease encumbrance of weapon by one to a minimum of one Mod.</description> <encumbrance/> <hard_points/> <hp_required>2</hp_required> <name>Balanced Hilt</name> <number>GEAR0001140</number> <price>1500</price> <range/> <rarity>5</rarity> <skill_used/> <soak/> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-18 19:15:17</sys_created_on> <sys_id>4d993d392face890e0f497eef699b6af</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-18 19:15:17</sys_updated_on> <type>mod</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
